trans-unit.target: TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDETRAVEL_Q1_000_010<tab>What would you like to do?
TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDETRAVEL_A1_000_011<tab>Learn about the Binding Coil of Bahamut.
TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDETRAVEL_A1_000_012<tab>Enter <var 28 ((InstanceContent)) E80204 /var>.
TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDETRAVEL_A1_000_013<tab>Nothing.

TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDETRAVEL_SYSTEM_000_050<tab>The Binding Coil of Bahamut is comprised of multiple dungeons, or <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>turns<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>. Please be warned that the spell Return cannot be used in certain turns.
TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDETRAVEL_SYSTEM_000_051<tab>Progress within the Binding Coil of Bahamut is saved at specific locations for each player, and you may resume your foray where you left off.

TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDETRAVEL_SYSTEM_000_052<tab>Progress is reset every <var 06 1203 /var><var 09 DD ((Sunday)) ((Monday)) ((Tuesday)) ((Wednesday)) ((Thursday)) ((Friday)) ((Saturday)) /var> at <var 08 DB ((<var 09 DB02030405060708090A0B0C0D02030405060708090A0B0C /var>)) 0D /var> <var 08 E0DB0D ((p.m.)) ((a.m.)) /var> (Earth time).
TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDETRAVEL_SYSTEM_000_053<tab>To enter the Binding Coil of Bahamut, you must be in a party of eight Disciples of War or Magic with a level of 50 or higher.
TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDETRAVEL_SYSTEM_000_054<tab>All members must also have completed the quest “Primal Awakening.”
TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDETRAVEL_SYSTEM_000_055<tab>The starting point is determined by the party leader's progress.
TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDETRAVEL_SYSTEM_000_056<tab>Even party members who have not progressed as far as the party leader may participate, provided they meet the entry requirements.
TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDETRAVEL_SYSTEM_000_0561<tab>In this case, their progress will be updated to be the same as that of the leader.
TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDETRAVEL_SYSTEM_000_057<tab>Please note, however, that parties whose members have progressed further than the party leader cannot resume a foray.
TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDETRAVEL_SYSTEM_000_058<tab>All forays into the Binding Coil of Bahamut are limited to 90 minutes (Earth time).
TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDETRAVEL_SYSTEM_000_059<tab>All items in a player's loot list will automatically be transferred to that player's inventory upon all other party members leaving the area.
TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDETRAVEL_SYSTEM_000_060<tab>Items unable to be obtained will be lost.
TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDETRAVEL_Q2_000_100<tab>Enter <var 28 ((InstanceContent)) E80204 /var>?
TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDETRAVEL_A2_000_101<tab>Yes
TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDETRAVEL_A2_000_102<tab>No
TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDETRAVEL_SYSTEM_000_110<tab>You were unable to enter <var 28 ((InstanceContent)) E80304 /var>. Make sure that you and your party meet all the conditions.
TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDETRAVEL_SYSTEM_000_210<tab>「大迷宮バハムート：邂逅編」をクリア （攻略進行度が最大に到達）しているため、 次回は、リセット日後に再開することができます。

TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDETRAVEL_SYSTEM_000_211<tab>攻略進行度の記録は、 （地球時間）毎週<var 06 1203 /var><var 09 DD ((Sunday)) ((Monday)) ((Tuesday)) ((Wednesday)) ((Thursday)) ((Friday)) ((Saturday)) /var> at <var 08 DB ((<var 09 DB02030405060708090A0B0C0D02030405060708090A0B0C /var>)) 0D /var> <var 08 E0DB0D ((p.m.)) ((a.m.)) /var>にリセットされます。 次回の攻略は、リセット日までお待ちください。
